messages.message: do we have a sandbox with 22.05 on it that we could deploy a new build to?

22.05 release sandbox: https://release-22-05-0.aws.sandbox.instabase.com/

pipeline to deploy to it: https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/control-plane-sandbox-provisioner/
@Orlando I’ll deploy to this sandbox and verify things are working as expected
btw, that env is auto-deployed to every 4 hours if there’s been a code change and has CI/CD test suites running post-deployment. You can check if it already has picked up your change

The logs from the last deploy show (https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/deploy-release-sandbox/job/release-22.05.0/652/console) that it ran about 2hrs ago and already includes the last commit I see on 22.05 right now.
```15:56:04  Checking out Revision 31f22ae0b89d8a347c552945775a31bccb7d9d60 (release-22.05.0)
15:56:04  Commit message: "fix merge conflict (#30874)"```
So if you’re trying to test https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/30810 then it should already be on there! :slightly_smiling_face:
